articles.title: Injury worries for Hull City as Tigers prepare for QPR trip - Hull Live
articles.description: City's injury list has a new member following Tuesday night's draw with Sheffield United
articles.content:
Lewie Coyles injury was the one sour note on an otherwise positive night for Hull City, after securing a valuable point at Sheffield United to end their three-game losing run.

articles.author: Matthew Syed
articles.title: Matthew Syed: What Novak Djokovic revealed to me at lunch - The Times
articles.description: I once had lunch with Novak Djokovic. We were at his organic restaurant in Monaco with his wife, Jelena, a couple of days after he had won the 2016 French Open.
